page.title: 03Great Coxwell's Clubs.
page.content: The village has several clubs:- 1) The Womens' Institute (average membership 21) meets monthly and is open to all females over 16.Average attendance is 15. 2) A weekly Ladies Keep Fit class (exercises to music) with an average attendance of 8. 3) An Art Class once a week during winter months for which several villagers have modelled for portraits. 4) A weekly Youth Club (ages 6-12) held all the year round. These are all held in the Parish Reading Room,& are run by villagers. There are bellringers who practise on the church's 5 bells; a choir and a Sunday School (ages 4-11); these all meet weekly in the Church.
